1   package org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.videotld;
2   
3   import java.util.List;
4   
5   import org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.detector.NNClassifier;
6   import org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.detector.NormalizedPatch;
7   import org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.videotld.TLDMain.Command;
8   import org.openimaj.image.DisplayUtilities;
9   import org.openimaj.image.FImage;
10  import org.openimaj.image.MBFImage;
11  import org.openimaj.image.colour.RGBColour;
12  import org.openimaj.image.processing.resize.ResizeProcessor;
13  import org.openimaj.image.typography.hershey.HersheyFont;
14  import org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle;
15  import org.openimaj.video.VideoDisplay;
16  import org.openimaj.video.VideoDisplay.Mode;
17  import org.openimaj.video.VideoDisplayListener;
18  import org.openimaj.video.tracking.klt.Feature;
19  
20  public class TLDVideoListener implements VideoDisplayListener<MBFImage> {
21  
22  	private TLDMain tldMain;
23  	private boolean reuseFrameOnce;
24  	private boolean skipProcessingOnce;
25  	private int currentFrame;
26  
27  	public TLDVideoListener(TLDMain tldMain) {
28  		this.tldMain = tldMain;
29  		this.reuseFrameOnce = false;
30  		this.skipProcessingOnce = false;
31  		currentFrame = 0;
32  	}
33  
34  	@Override
35  	public void beforeUpdate(MBFImage frame) {
36  		if (this.tldMain.selector.drawRect(frame)) {
37  			return;
38  		}
39  		final long tic = System.currentTimeMillis();
40  		currentFrame++;
41  		FImage grey = null;
42  		if (!reuseFrameOnce) {
43  			grey = frame.flatten();
44  		}
45  
46  		if (!skipProcessingOnce) {
47  			tldMain.tld.processImage(grey);
48  		} else {
49  			skipProcessingOnce = false;
50  		}
51  
52  		if (tldMain.printResults != null) {
53  			if (tldMain.tld.currBB != null) {
54  				tldMain.resultsFile.printf("%d %.2f %.2f %.2f %.2f %f\n", currentFrame - 1, tldMain.tld.currBB.x,
55  						tldMain.tld.currBB.y, tldMain.tld.currBB.width, tldMain.tld.currBB.height, tldMain.tld.currConf);
56  			} else {
57  				tldMain.resultsFile.printf("%d NaN NaN NaN NaN NaN\n", currentFrame - 1);
58  			}
59  		}
60  
61  		final float fps = 1 / ((System.currentTimeMillis() - tic) / 1000f);
62  
63  		final boolean confident = (tldMain.tld.currConf >= tldMain.threshold) ? true : false;
64  
65  		if (tldMain.showOutput || tldMain.saveDir != null) {
66  			String learningString = "";
67  			if (tldMain.tld.isLearning()) {
68  				learningString = "learning";
69  			}
70  
71  			final String string = String.format("#%d,Posterior %.2f; fps: %.2f, #numwindows:%d, %s", currentFrame - 1,
72  					tldMain.tld.currConf, fps, tldMain.tld.detectorCascade.getNumWindows(), learningString);
73  			final Float[] yellow = RGBColour.YELLOW;
74  			final Float[] blue = RGBColour.BLUE;
75  			final Float[] red = RGBColour.RED;
76  
77  			if (tldMain.tld.currBB != null) {
78  				final Float[] rectangleColor = confident ? blue : yellow;
79  				// cvRectangle(img, tld.currBB.tl(), tld.currBB.br(),
80  				// rectangleColor, 8, 8, 0);
81  				frame.drawShape(tldMain.tld.currBB, rectangleColor);
82  				if (tldMain.markerMode && this.tldMain.tld.medianFlowTracker.featuresTrackedToBfromA != null) {
83  					// Draw the tracked points
84  					final Feature[] from = this.tldMain.tld.medianFlowTracker.featuresTrackedToBfromA.features;
85  					final Feature[] to = this.tldMain.tld.medianFlowTracker.featuresTrackedToAviaB.features;
86  					for (int i = 0; i < from.length; i++) {
87  						frame.drawLine(from[i], to[i], 3, red);
88  					}
89  				}
90  			}
91  
92  			drawPositivePatches();
93  
94  			final HersheyFont font = HersheyFont.ROMAN_SIMPLEX;
95  			frame.drawText(string, 25, 25, font, 12);
96  
97  		}
98  
99  		if (reuseFrameOnce) {
100 			reuseFrameOnce = false;
101 		}
102 
103 	}
104 
105 	private void drawPositivePatches() {
106 		final NNClassifier nnClass = tldMain.tld.detectorCascade.getNNClassifier();
107 		final List<NormalizedPatch> patches = nnClass.getPositivePatches();
108 		final Rectangle inDim = new Rectangle(0, 0, NormalizedPatch.TLD_PATCH_SIZE, NormalizedPatch.TLD_PATCH_SIZE);
109 		final int X = 5;
110 		final int Y = Math.max(6, (patches.size() / X) + 1);
111 		final FImage out = new FImage(50 * X, 50 * Y);
112 		out.fill(1f);
113 		int i = 0;
114 		final Rectangle otRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, 50, 50);
115 		for (final NormalizedPatch normalizedPatch : patches) {
116 			otRect.x = (i % X) * 50;
117 			otRect.y = (i / X) * 50;
118 			if ((i / X) >= Y)
119 				break;
120 			ResizeProcessor.zoom(normalizedPatch.normalisedPatch, inDim, out, otRect);
121 			i++;
122 		}
123 		DisplayUtilities.displayName(out, "patches", true);
124 	}
125 
126 	@Override
127 	public void afterUpdate(VideoDisplay<MBFImage> display) {
128 		if (this.tldMain.command == Command.NONE) {
129 		}
130 		else if (this.tldMain.command == Command.ALTERNATING) {
131 		}
132 		else if (this.tldMain.command == Command.CLEAR) {
133 			this.tldMain.tld.release();
134 		}
135 		else if (this.tldMain.command == Command.SELECT) {
136 			this.tldMain.disp.setMode(Mode.PAUSE);
137 			this.tldMain.selector.selectBoundingBox();
138 		}
139 		else if (this.tldMain.command == Command.LEARNING) {
140 			tldMain.tld.learningEnabled = !tldMain.tld.learningEnabled;
141 		}
142 		tldMain.command = Command.NONE;
143 	}
144 
145 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
